content: Auction of Playtoshi Ballet cards #22 to #39 ¬†  More information https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5454583.0 Each Playtoshi Ballet Card contains: 1 Ballet Card + 1 Bitcoin Stamp #18469not include the .001 BTC load value Bitcoin Stamp with the numbering: #18469 (supply 50) one in each Ballet card:https://stampchain.io/asset.html?asset=A6081544777038959624¬†Stamps on the Bitcoin chain for all the eternityLOTS:#22 thru #39STARTING BID PER LOT: 0 BTC MINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001 BTC END TIME: Sunday, June 11th, 17:00 (5:00 pm) New York üïêWhen placing your bid, please post your username followed by lot # and followed by bid amountExample:MoparMiningLLC - lot 36 - .001 BTC**Payment due within 48 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time for all lots.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid for all lots. Basically, auction ends at the appointed time - unless extended - if extended the auction ends once 5 minutes elapse with no bids.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC and only to this address: bc1qv8a9a6dkcdluw33mzasakxwvkt5m8u8tteh2rs ¬†- if you get a pm to pay any other way - ignore it, it will not be from me.Shipping can be done directly by me or item can be provided to minerjones for consolidation with other orders and reshipping. There is no fee for me to provide them to minerjones.
